subject: SAVE MONEY
body:
Truman@hurting.com

Thank you for your loan request, which we received yesterday, 
We'd like to inform you that we are accepting your application, 
We are ready to give you a $272,000 loan (Refinance approved) 
http://plastelink.com/1/i
For a low month payment approval process will take only 1 minute. 
Please visit the confirmation link below 
And fill-out our short 30 second form. 
http://plastelink.com/1/i
